model.online

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.online.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is in charge of creating the server connection, get data from ServerView and CreateGameDialog, creating the first completed game JSON, as well as processing the data sent by clients.
    Author:
    PMC

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(org.json.JSONObject gameConfigJSON)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getExpectedPlayers()
      This method returns the expected number of players to be connected, specified previously by GUI
      int getNumPlayers()
      This method returns the number of players that have been already connected so that it can be shown in GUI to send feedback to user
      void receiveFromClient(org.json.JSONObject json, ServerClient client)
      This synchronized method allows server to process the information sent by a client and perform several tasks depending on the nature of the information sent (i.e. the type of notification)
      void start(int port)
      This method creates a ServerSocket given the given port from GUI.
      void stop()
      This method stops the server
      void waitForAllPlayersToChooseTeam()
      This synchronized method is used to stop server's game processing methods until all players have been connected.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(org.json.JSONObject gameConfigJSON)
        Constructor. It stores a primitive version of the JSON that contains the information of the game, as well as being in charge of calling ServerView to get the connection data.
        Parameters:
        gameConfigJSON - Primitive version of the JSON that contains the information of the game specified by CreateGameDialog

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(int port)
           throws java.io.IOException
        This method creates a ServerSocket given the given port from GUI. Then, it calls waitForPlayers the perform the expected connections
        Parameters:
        port - Integer that specifies the port in which user has specified to open the connection specified by CreateGameDialog.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - completar

      • stop

        public void stop()
        This method stops the server

      • receiveFromClient

        public void receiveFromClient(org.json.JSONObject json,
                              ServerClient client)
        This synchronized method allows server to process the information sent by a client and perform several tasks depending on the nature of the information sent (i.e. the type of notification)
        Parameters:
        json - completar
        client - completar

      • waitForAllPlayersToChooseTeam

        public void waitForAllPlayersToChooseTeam()
        This synchronized method is used to stop server's game processing methods until all players have been connected.

      • getExpectedPlayers

        public int getExpectedPlayers()
        This method returns the expected number of players to be connected, specified previously by GUI
        Returns:
        Integer that represents the number of players to be connected

      • getNumPlayers

        public int getNumPlayers()
        This method returns the number of players that have been already connected so that it can be shown in GUI to send feedback to user
        Returns:
        Integer that represents the number of players that have been already connected
